parameter.name: contactId
parameter.description: Unique identifier for a particular contact. In HubSpot's contact system, contact ID's are called 'vid'.

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: If you include the 'property' parameter, then the properties in the 'contact' object in the returned data will only include the property or properties that you request.

parameter.name: propertyMode
parameter.description: One of 'value_only' or 'value_and_history' to specify if the current value for a property should be fetched, or the value and all the historical values for that property. Default is 'value_only'.

parameter.name: formSubmissionMode
parameter.description: One of 'all', 'none', 'newest', 'oldest' to specify which form submissions should be fetched. Default is 'newest'.

parameter.name: showListMemberships
parameter.description: Boolean 'true' or 'false' to indicate whether current list memberships should be fetched for the contact. Default is false.
